ygData.subject: Re: Gazamel
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, but I am not Mauldoon. I heard his name mentioned once before in this list. I am Raskur, a level 50 enchanter on Veeshan who plays his secondaries
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, but I am not Mauldoon. I heard his name mentioned once before in this list. I am Raskur, a level 50 enchanter on Veeshan who plays his secondaries often. As for this Mauldoon, I suspect he's not a nice guy, but then again, that's your server and not mine :)

Raskur Everheart, level 50 Enchanter


----- Original Message -----
From: John F Vanden Bosch Jr
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, January 19, 2000 4:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gazamel


From: John F Vanden Bosch Jr <jfvbjr@...>


As a Gnome Enchanter and one of the only two (now maybe three) in my guild, a certin amout of request are made on my time.

As of which I have not had a chance to spent time or the money (it goes to other projects) in what is my skill by race.

As i go about my life on the plant we call Norrath i have had to pleasure (and misfortune) to meet both Gazamel, and Mauldoon.

My metting with Gazamel was one of a polite gnome, asking how I was doing, and how my work progressed in Tinkering. The question here was more along the lines of "How are you doing, adn do you need any help"

MY metting with Mauldoon was any thing but. I once sent an appolige to Mauldoon for the wrong "misinformed on my part" done to him by other Gnomes trying to get him to tell them where the items to tinkering where. This was done in a chance to strick up a conversation and posible friendship. The responce i recived from Mauldoon was nada. My one metting with him, was when he apporched me, acted like we were old friends and asked for a Clarity.

At this point in my short life (pun intended) my respect is in Gazamel.

Tinkerten Iktomi
37th circle Enchanter
Solusek Ro
